raw_body: WELIWITA – THUSITHA – Beloved wife of late Lion Prabha Chandra Weliwita,​ mother of Dhananjaya (USA) and Sidath,​ mother-in-law of Dr Savithri Muthukuda (USA) and Gayani Gankanda,​ grandmother of Shenali (USA),​ Mayashi and Shanaal,​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie at residence Kendaliyaddapaluwa,​ Ganemulla. Cremation will take place at 4 p.m. on Thursday,​ 14th September 2023 at Kendaliyaddapaluwa,​ Ganemulla.058082
